name: v1.7.2
body:
Bugfix
* QR codes not reading properly #481

name: v1.7.1
body:
Improvements
* Enable "show password" option when changing password
* Re-mask passwords when submitting
* Compiled for newer Android versions.

name: v1.7.0
body:
Improvements
* Updated setup flow to on-board new users in a nicer interface.

Bugfixes
* App crashes on non-SQRL QR codes

name: v1.6.0
body:
Improvements
* Update rescue code page to new design.
* Implement support for tif = 0x200 (reuse of old identity)
* Implement unit tests for test vectors (2/6)
* Added Indonesian language
* Added Italian language
* Added Portuguese language

Bugfixes
* Crash report in showErrorMessageInternal from Google Play
* Camera is being used after Camera.release() was called
* Base56 zero-padding missing on decoding
* EnHash regression
* QuickPass not working with large timeout values
* Error when leaving "QuickPass Timeout" field empty

name: v1.5.1
body:
Improvements
* Back option added to all activities for easily returning to previous activity.
* Added the Korean language

Bugfixes
* Identity Management menu option should only be available from the main
* Fix Alt-Id input field not being recognized as such
* Fixing padding on base56 encoding.

name: v1.5.0
body:
Bugfix
* Handle rename in a consistent manner.
* Fixing contrast issues in darkmode

Improvements
* Better darkmode frontpage
* Add help texts to password fields.
* Remove extra prefix "SQRL -"
* First identity will now have the name "My identity"

name: v1.4.0
body:
Bugfix
* Better clearing of QuickPass

Improvements
* Improved login dialog
    * Alternative ID can now easily be used with disable, remove and enable.
    * Handling disable, enable and remove directly
    * Added help texts and cleaner flow.
* Improved design on multiple activities
    * Language selection
    * Rekey presentation and entering
    * CPS Missing
    * New identity done
* Added icons to improve menu selection
* Adaptive icons for all versions of Android
* Improved CPS flow with simple page when cancelation address missing
* Code clean-up and improved readability.

name: v1.3.0
body:
Improvement
* Main page QR scan can now be used for import.
* Use the same GUI for QR Scan and button clicked on web page.

Bugfixes
* Don't display Identity management on that page.
* Handle rekey event correctly. Send new SUK on login.

name: v1.2.0
body:
Feature
* Polish and Finish translations
* Information popup information for settings.

Bugfix
* Fixes for Disable, Enable and Remove account.
* Fix to handle clearing of previous data.
* Landscape selector now working for URL layout.
* Exclude login activity from history and recent apps.
* Handle empty ask question.
* Fixes for contrast in show rescue code dialog.

Enhancement
* Improved selection of identities.

name: v1.1.0
body:
Feature
* Hindi and Chinese translations
* Application shortcuts

Enhancement
* Improved rename GUI
* Remove share feature with application
* Improved selection of identities.

Bugfix
* Handle long URLs.
* Fix "missing argument" error

name: v1.0.0
body:
Feature
* Added application shortcuts

Enhancements
* Added file import to start activity
* Better contrasting night colors
* Improved domain verification
* Identity Management v2

Bugfix
* Remove login popup after failed password

name: v0.16.1
body:
Bug fix
* QR code import not working on the startup screen

Changes
* Rename Advanced operations to Identity management
* Remove Use identity in Identity management
* Reorder buttons on Identity Management

name: v0.16.0
body:
Feature
* Enable import of base64-url encoded identities
* Show identity name in SimplifiedActivity
* Read identity from file

name: v0.15.0
body:
Bug
* Don't delete quickpass on network errors.
* Login popup issue
* Simply login code and fix some inconsistencies
* Landscape bugfix
* Fix Alt-ID to use null character
* Fixing Lastpass popup for verify field
* Handle language change better.

Feature
* Password strength meter
* Easy rescue code entry moving between fields
* Share identity with application

Deprecation
* Removed quickpass notification

name: v0.14.0
body:
Features
* New even more simplified view with one button
* Make vector graphic work on older OS versions
* Only show the current identity if only one is available.
* Added language Catalan

Bug
* Errors could in some cases be obscured by the login box.
* Handle printing identity better, sometimes crashed 
* Handle dropdown better could crash
* Fixed bug so we can't go back to onboarding when we have an identity
* Retain quickpass and biometric data even if you close the app.
* Handle when ASK command got stuck in a loop.

name: v0.13.5
body:
Improvements:
* Added circular icons - Thanks @sengsational
* Correct button placement - Thanks @janneoksanen

Bug fixes:
* Select identity correction

name: v0.13.4
body:
Bugs fixes:
* Rename bug always adding (1) even if unique name
* Incorrect flow when importing identity both text and QR code replacing old identity
* Fixes for crash bug when showing error message after return to activity

name: v0.13.3
body:
Bugs fixes:
* Bug when exiting app before error shown.
* Error when removing text after resume in text import.
* Correct error dialog on second run of saving identity. #248

name: v0.13.2
body:
Minor improvements.
- Fixed crash bug
- Moved error message for text import
- Updated error message for stale pages and failed connections
- Updated language strings.

name: v0.13.1
body: Application name change.

name: v0.13.0
body:
Bugs
* Change to send noiptest on all QR logins.
* Fix to show ellipsis again
* Login popup is moved so not obscured by keyboard.

name: v0.12.2
body:
Features
* Handle unique names
* Lock rotation during progress and login prompts

Bugs
* Handle crash bug on old devices, Vector drawable not supported.
* Manually handle biometrics auth removal.
* LastPass triggers for Password verify in seconds number
* Scan identity back button weirdness part 2

name: v0.12.1
body:
Feature
* Czech language
* Biometric support for Android Pie and above

Bugs
* Fixed day and night theme.
* Obscure back button bug
* Unreadable tooltip during new identity creation

name: v0.12.0
body:
* DayNight mode
* Slovenian language
* Vector drawable logo
* Reduced resources
* Compressed background

name: V0.11.0
body:
New features
* Handle screen rotation
* manual language change
* Implement x=n functionality

New languages
* Japanese
* French
* Spanish

name: v0.10.1
body: Small bugfix when CPS url is missing a cancelation callback.

name: v0.10.0
body:
Improvements
* More air between buttons on advanced page
* Indicator that their is more options to scroll to on advanced page
* Add a confirmation prompt to the "Remove Identity" option.
* Add the option to view the full password when you type it

Bugs
* Handle IP mismatch correctly
* Handle CPS failures correctly
* Revert password field on failing QuickPass
* Fail and report when badly formatted response

name: v0.9.0
body:
Features
* Text import can be done as a new user
* New identity available in advanced options
* Use the new error dialog for all errors.

Bugfixes
* Handle enlarged text better
* More robust QRCode read
* Error when an incorrect path is encoded in QRCode

Improvements
* Change to use activities for most functions.

name: v0.8.1
body:
Feature
- All requests to the servers could be answered by an ASK
- Added error dialog to highlight communication errors.

Bugfix
- We don't backup the key database anymore
- Quickpass was encrypting the wrong key on import no longer kept.
- We now show how many chars to enter on quickpass

name: Version 0.8.0
body:
Features
- Client Provided Session
- Textual recovery

Bugs
- When clicking the back button, the app opens the same page #bug
- Fix wiring on forms so keyboards close
- Quick pass with the wrong login failed

Minor fixes
- Import from start page is its own thing
- The encryption key for Password section is now quick pass

name: Version 0.7.1
body:
New features
- Translation to Swedish and Dutch
- Added simplified mode by default
- Import without password
- Export without password
- Unlock and remove with previous keys

Bugs fixes
- Print icon less pixelated
- All text printed should not be bold
- Handle invalid QR codes

name: Version 0.6.0
body:
New features
- Index-Secret
- ASK Protocol
- Print identity

Bug and other small fixes
- Tabs on help pages
- Seeming password reprompt bug
- Check if camera is allowed for key creation
- Invisible headers on older phones
- Set selected key on reload.

name: Version 0.5.0
body:
New features
- Handle previous keys
- Rekey identity
- Create identity

Bugfix
- Import identity hangs after failed password attempt
- The correct label on scan action

name: Version 0.4.0
body:
New features
- Handle URL Scheme qrl:// and sqrl://
- Remove quick pass after a set time

Improvements
- Handle options for all client calls
- Change texts for notification
- Content descriptions for close buttons
- Verify previous key block
- Send the most recent previous key to the server.

name: Version 0.2.1
body:
New features
-Set identity name on import
-Cancel popup button
-Handle longer screens
-Reset password
-Restore identity without password
-Snackbar

Bug fixes
-Don't read rekeyed information
-Caps lock issue
-Only using libsodium and grc library for crypto.
-A lot of other minor bug fixes

name: Version 0.1.0
body:
New features
* Implement simple harvester (SHA1PRNG)
* Account creation
* Change password
* Settings and options
* Identity unlocked notification

Fixed reported bugs
* text block leading space
* Can't import ID without password data
* Make links clickable
